thread.section_title: iTailor Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of iTailor | itailor.com
thread.title: Michael York

author: Michael York
title: Michael York
text:
As anyone who gets into weight lifting knows it's impossible to get anything to fit from most clothes shops when you have a big chest and a narrow waist without it looking like someone has put a coat hanger across your shoulders.
Website is really simple, design the shirt, get someone to take your measurements as instructed on the website and in a couple of weeks you get a properly fitted tailored shirt.
Plus Royal Mail deliver so if you're not in you just get it from the sorting office which is way more convenient than these other Mickey Mouse couriers that only deliver when you're at work and aren't available at weekends.
